description: Gurjaras are an infantry civilization that excels in early game rushes and has a powerful late game army.
dark_age: Start with 3 villagers and a scout.
Build 2 houses and a lumber camp near forests.
Train additional villagers from the town center.
Use the scout to explore the map and find resources.
Advance to Feudal Age at around 14-15 minutes with 500 food and 200 gold.
Have around 800-1000 food, 200-300 wood, and 100-150 gold at the end of the Dark Age.
Assign 4-5 villagers to food, 2-3 to wood, 1-2 to gold, and 3-4 to stone.
feudal_age: Build a blacksmith and market to upgrade infantry units and sell excess resources for gold.
Train additional militia and research Man-at-Arms upgrade.
Advance to Castle Age at around 20-21 minutes with 800 food and 400 gold.
Have around 1500-2000 food, 500-600 wood, 400-500 gold, and 200-300 stone at the end of the Feudal Age.
Assign 8-10 villagers to food, 5-6 to wood, 3-4 to gold, and 6-7 to stone.
castle_age: Continue producing infantry units and research Squires and Arson upgrades.
Build a second and third barracks to produce more infantry units.
Build a university and research Masonry and Architecture to improve the defense of buildings.
Advance to Imperial Age at around 30-31 minutes with 1000 food, 1000 gold, and 800 stone.
Have around 3000-3500 food, 1500-2000 wood, 1500-2000 gold, and 1000-1200 stone at the end of the Castle Age.
Assign 20-25 villagers to food, 12-15 to wood, 10-12 to gold, and 15-20 to stone.
imperial_age: Continue producing infantry units and research Elite Skirmisher and Halberdier upgrades.
Use Halberdiers to counter cavalry and Skirmishers to counter archers.
Have around 5000-6000 food, 3000-4000 wood, and 3000-4000 gold in the late Imperial Age.
Assign 40-50 villagers to food, 20-25 to wood, 16-20 to gold, and 25-30 to stone.
